feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: sms stats for journey by @neo773 in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/703
  • api tests by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/706
  • [DF-299] filter users by user property or segment value by @oliverqx in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/616
  • user filter improvements by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/707
  • user filter autocomplete overflow by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/708
  • fix journey percentages by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/704
  • add spans to user events ch methods by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/709
  • fix /api/events performance by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/711
  • fix journey store tests by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/712
  • provide more detailed instructions when fail to update api docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/713
  • fix formatting for postmark settings by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/714
  • fix deliveries template link by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/715
  • feat: Paginated Tables for Resource List Views by @Wr4th100 in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/602
  • resource tables consolidation by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/716
  • resource tables cleanup cont. by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/717
  • update api openapi schema by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/718
  • cleanup resource table styles by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/719
  • lint fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/720
  • use resource table for subscription groups by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/721
  • fix type errors, make admin-cli not strict for prisma cmd by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/722
  • more resource table corrections by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/723
  • re-order user properties table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/724
  • use clickhouse safe variable names by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/726
  • journey drafts by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/727
  • JSON parse large numbers as strings by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/728
  • journey percentages turn on by default by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/729

New Contributors

  • @Wr4th100 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/602

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.10.1...v0.11.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • journey stats fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/733
  • prevent default in resource table delete confirm by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/734
  • fix journeys name updates by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/735

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.11.0...v0.11.1

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • catch errors from user property json path query by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/738
  • default frequency of compute properties workflow 30 seconds -> 2 minutes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/739

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.11.1...v0.11.2

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • optimization for user property assignment query by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/743
  • disableRowSelectionOnClick resource table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/744
  • clean up column names of events table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/745
  • optimize insert into computed_property_state_v2 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/746
  • remove Journey relation from UserJourneyEvent by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/747
  • add missing migration file for UserJourneyEvent by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/748
  • skip empty journey stats calls by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/749
  • email subscription headers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/751
  • message stats fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/753
  • type check fixes for message node stat changes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/754
  • implement perf improvements for journey node ui by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/755
  • don't load message template and segment definitions by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/756
  • add unsubscribe headers to ses by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/757
  • fix template select from journeys by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/758
  • corrects resend naming convention by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/759
  • correct resend event metadata by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/760
  • hide journey stats while dragging new component by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/761
  • not equals segment operator by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/764
  • cleanup activities messaging by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/765
  • fix not equals segment value by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/766
  • fixes race condition in message tracking by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/767
  • not equals on missing traits by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/768
  • fix for workflow re-entry check by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/769
  • fix end to end tests by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/770

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.11.2...v0.12.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade docs for v0.12.1 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/771

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1
